players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I'm shocked and saddened by Alice's sudden demise. We should all work together to uncover the truth behind this tragic event."
Diana: "Based on my investigation during the night, I have discovered that Bob is the mafioso. Let us work together to ensure his deceitful actions do not continue."

You: "I'm grateful for Diana's quick deduction and agreement to work together against the mafia. I urge Charlie to share any information he might have, as we continue our mission to uncover the truth."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob
